[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527767850756{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1689853228104{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”“Interfacing with limitless Cutting-edge Engineering solutions“” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853087432{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”At VOE, we pride ourselves in delivering exceptional solutions that meet the highest standards of quality, innovation, and reliability. With our expertise in data engineering, digital twin solutions, and 3D modeling, we empower our clients to embrace the future, drive efficiency, and achieve their engineering goals.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853006031{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8450″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691189743681{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Data Engineering” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853428672{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our data engineering services are designed to help you harness the power of data. We specialize in collecting, organizing, and analyzing vast amounts of data, enabling you to derive meaningful insights and make informed decisions. We leverage advanced technologies and methodologies to ensure data accuracy, integrity, and security, empowering you to unlock the full potential of your data assets.

Expertise
✔ Data Management Solutions
✔ Data Scanning
✔ State of The Art Data Depository Facilities
✔ Data Archiving Solutions
✔ Data Ready Access Solutions

Technical Collaboration
✔ Strong collaboration with a multi-national company.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691003310134{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Digital Twin” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853474685{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Embrace the future of engineering with our digital twin solutions. By creating virtual replicas of physical assets or systems, we enable real-time monitoring, simulation, and analysis. Our digital twin services empower you to optimize performance, identify potential issues, and explore different scenarios, ultimately enhancing efficiency, productivity, and cost-effectiveness. Experience the power of virtual representation and gain a competitive edge in the digital age.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853514131{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8451″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691189767684{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8452″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691189822365{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”3D Modelling” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689853539896{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Visualize your ideas and designs like never before with our world-class 3D modelling services. Our skilled team of designers and engineers utilize advanced software and techniques to create detailed and realistic 3D models. Whether you need architectural renderings, product prototypes, or industrial designs, our 3D modelling services bring your concepts to life with precision and accuracy. Our skilled team of designers and engineers utilize advanced software and techniques to create detailed and realistic 3D models. Experience the power of virtual representation and gain a competitive edge in the digital age.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691003464083{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Expertise
✔ Facility Digitalization using Laser Scanning
✔ 3D Dimensional Controlled Modelling
✔ Creation of Engineering drawings & modelling using the acquired data.
✔ Virtual Installation of Fabricated Modules
✔ Asset Integrity Management

 

Advantages
✔ Use Updated 3D Model and 3D Laser Scan model as baseline
for FEED/DED studies
✔ Identify and certify all Design Tie-Points
✔ Evaluate optimal routing options for production flowlines and ensure clash-free design model
✔ Constructability review of design model in as-built environment (laser scan model)

 

Assets
✔ Operating with State of the art Leica Scan Stations

 

Technical Collaboration
✔Strong Technical Collaboration with an international company.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
